name: The Little Fire by Tabacalera Guardabarranco
additionalNotes:
"Crafted by the skilled artisans of Tabacalera Guardabarranco in Esteli, Nicaragua – makers of renowned Gilligan Golf cigar – comes a fiery new creation, “The Little Fire,” locally known as ‘fuego pequeño.’  This cigar is not for the faint of heart or suited for a gentle morning smoke.  Its robust flavors and intense profile reflect the dramatic backdrop of Esteli’s vibrant tobacco industry, a realm marked by fierce competition and hardship.

Every puff of “The Little Fire” tells a tale of survival and persistence, encapsulating the ongoing struggle for tobacco excellence in the region.  By aging these cigars ourselves, we ensure they maintain their potent ‘fuerte,’ a direct testimony to their resilience and unwavering commitment to quality.  These cigars stand as a bold expression of artistry and endurance, offering a smoking experience that is both impactful and memorable.

Whether you’re a seasoned cigar smoker or a newcomer eager to explore the depth of Nicaraguan cigars, “The Little Fire” promises an unforgettable journey through the rich tapestry of flavors and stories woven into the fabric of Esteli’s tobacco legacy."
https://privadacigarclub.com/product/the-little-fire-by-tabacalera-guardabarranco-aged-2-years/
